page.title: Greetings Between People of Different Genders

property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: An American speaking with members of the Pakistan military

note.text: Men can greet women by saying “hello” or "asalaamo 'aleykum" and nodding slightly. Do not extend your hand for a handshake, especially in a social or informal setting. Only shake a female counterpart’s hand if she offers her hand first.
Women may greet men with a handshake. However, religiously observant Muslims do not touch people of the opposite gender. Don’t be offended if someone of the opposite gender doesn’t shake your hand.
